response.original_title: The Cursed Treasure, Made in Agege
response.overview: Danso returns home from Agege with two friends of his where their expectations were not met. Back home, Danso and his friends engage in all forms of acts to survive. Danso however chances on vital information that changes his life and sets the viewers of the movie THE CURSED TREASURE (Made In Agege) on a roller-coaster.
response.title: The Cursed Treasure, Made in Agege
